list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: though they were speaking in undertones, Philip could hear them
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mặc dù họ đang nói về Instesttones, Philip có thể nghe thấy họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: however (indicating that a factor qualifies or imposes restrictions on what was said previously).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was hunting for work. Jobs were scarce though
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang săn lùng công việc.
